description: House Republican leadership placed Representative George Santos on two committees, even as some G.O.P. congressmen have called for his resignation.

title: Airlines push for FAA system upgrade after major outage
description: Airlines are calling on Congress and the Biden administration to give the FAA more staff and more money to upgrade its systems.
content:
Airlines have been pushing the FAA to modernize the air-traffic control system for years. After this week's outage, they're pushing harder.

title: Top U.S. lawmaker objects to potential F-16 sale to Turkey
description: The Biden administration has told Congress it is preparing the potential $20 billion sale of F-16 fighter jets to Turkey, sources familiar with the matter said on Friday, sparking an immediate objection from a senior U.S. lawmaker who has long opposed the deal.
content: WASHINGTON, Jan 13 (Reuters) - The Biden administration has told Congress it is preparing the potential $20 billion sale of F-16 fighter jets to Turkey, sources familiar with the matter said on Friday, sparking an immediate objection from a senior U.... [3782 chars]

title: Biden to deliver his State of the Union address on Feb. 7
description: President Joe Biden will deliver his second State of the Union address before Congress on Feb. 7.
content:
WASHINGTON — President Joe Biden will deliver his second State of the Union address before Congress on Feb. 7.
Speaker Kevin McCarthy, R-Calif., invited Biden to deliver the address on that date in a letter Friday.

title: Biden admin preparing to ask Congress to approve sale of F-16 jets to Turkey
description: The Biden administration is preparing to ask Congress to approve the sale of 40 F-16 fighter jets to Turkey, after weighing a Turkish request for the planes for more than a year, congressional sources familiar with the deliberations told CNN.
content:
